thread.title_full: Great location! Away from the noise of so many other places!! - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, opposite Rockefeller Center, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sellshomesfaster
title: Great location! Away from the noise of so many other places!!
text:
We stayed four nights and had a very pleasant experience. Staff were always accomodating and we enjoyed coming back to The Terrace for a break for a relaxing drink and good food! We walked to St. Patrick's Church, Rockefeller Center and the skating rink! Subway was very close and many restaurants to choose from!!!
Room Tip: We had a great view of Rockefeller Center and St. Patrick's Cathedral!!! See more room tips
